item.title: Derek add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Some people see the glass half full. Others see it half empty. I see a glass that's twice as big as it needs to be." -- George Carlin

item.title: Derek add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I say let me never be complete, I say may I never be content,I say deliver me from Swedish furniture, I say deliver me from clever arts, I say deliver me from clear skin and perfect teeth,I say you have to give up! I say evolve, and let the chips fall where they may!" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Derek add a quote by Virgil
item.description: "Una Salus Victis Nullam Sperare Salutem - (Latin - written 19 BC) The only hope for the doomed, is no hope at all..." -- Virgil

item.title: Derek add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
